comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Are we talking about eSIM enabled numbers or we are talking about hardware. Although I do not know how it works but I want to find out if this is a more advanced technology compared to the regular and also, if its hardware then we are talking of shipping it across. Is it cost effective to purchase and what makes it any different from the other numbers that are being sold online in various sites.
